summary: Jimi Hendrix's landmark concert in Monterey County Fairgrounds in California in which he plays signature songs like "Purple Haze," "Foxy Lady," and "Wild Thing."
cast: Jimi Hendrix|Noel Redding|Mitch Mitchell|John Phillips|George Harrison|Mick Jagger|Brian Jones|Janis Joplin|John Lennon|Paul McCartney|Charles Shaar Murray|Ringo Starr|Denny Dent
keywords: rock music|concert film|independent film|character name in title
title: Jimi Plays Monterey
